ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Notes: e.g., Baseline, Morning, At Bedtime

ElementDescription: Absence of Problem: I do not think I have a problem with drugs
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Absence of Problem: No one has told me I have a problem with drugs
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Absence of Problem: My drug use is not causing any problems
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Absence of Problem: I do not think treatment will make my life better
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Absence of Problem: I can handle my drug use on my own
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Absence of Problem: I do not think I need treatment
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Negative Social Support: I will lose my friends if I go to treatment
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Negative Social Support: Friends tell me not to go to treatment
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Negative Social Support: People will think badly of me if I go to treatment
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Negative Social Support: My family will be embarrassed or ashamed if I go to treatment
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Negative Social Support: Someone in my family does not want to go to treatment
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Fear of Treatment: I have had a bad experience with treatment
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Fear of Treatment: I'm afraid of what might happen in treatment
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Fear of Treatment: I'm afraid of the people I might see in treatment
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Fear of Treatment: I am too embarrassed or ashamed to go to treatment
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Privacy Concern: I do not like to talk in groups
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Privacy Concern: I hate being asked personal questions
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Privacy Concern: I do not like to talk about my personal life with other people
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Time Conflict: I have things to do at home that make it hard for me to get to treatment
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Time Conflict: It will be hard for me to find a treatment program that fits my schedule
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Poor Treatment Availability: I am moving too far away to get treatment
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Poor Treatment Availability: I do not know where to go for treatment
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Poor Treatment Availability: I have difficulty getting to and from treatment
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Admission Difficulty: I will have to be on a waiting list for a while
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Admission Difficulty: I have to go through too many steps to get into treatment
Notes: 1 = Disagree strongly; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Uncertain; 4 = Agree; 5 = Agree strongly

ElementDescription: Absence of a Problem: Standardized correlation coefficients
Negative Social Support: Standardized correlation coefficients
Fear of Treatment: Standardized correlation coefficients
Privacy Concerns: Standardized correlation coefficients
Time Conflict: Standardized correlation coefficients
